name: datapack-linter
description: Processing to lint datapack with GitHub Action
author: ChenCMD

scripts.build: dotenv cross-var sbt fullOptJS/webpack && mv dist/datapack-linter-opt-bundle.js dist/index.js
scripts.build:dev: dotenv cross-var sbt fastOptJS/webpack && mv dist/datapack-linter-fastopt-bundle.js dist/index.js
